\N<Segi>In the end... I went to see him. I got swept away...

\N<Segi>No matter how much I try to bluff with all my might... I
can't follow through with that stubbornness...

\N<Segi>It's true that being embraced by him has somewhat eased my
symptoms. And... it has enabled me to fight.
\N<Segi>But in doing so, I have... lost something important...
OriginMenuStatus SetParam param3 Pregnant_(Rozaro's_child)
OriginMenuStatus SetParam param4 Rozaro
OriginMenuStatus SetParamVariable param1 17
A
<ActiveMessage:\C[10]■EV発生■>
\N<Rozaro>What's the matter, Segi-san? Do you need something from me?
\N<Segi>...

\N<Rozaro>Why are you silent? Tomorrow is the day of the trial by
combat, isn't it? It's a day that will decide the fate of
you, Riia, and Yuia. Is it really okay for you to be idling
away here?

\N<Segi>Ah, I am well aware of how important tomorrow's battle is
for our family...
\N<Segi>That's exactly why... I might have come here.

\N<Rozaro>Hmph... I see. With those words, I can guess the situation.
You've become quite honest.

\N<Rozaro>From the start... if you had been this honest in front of
me, you wouldn't have had to suffer as you do now.
\N<Segi>...!
\N<Segi>Haah, haah... Please...

\N<Segi>Because I think tomorrow's battle is so important... that's
why I have a favor to ask of you...

\N<Rozaro>Understood, I'll listen to your request. But there's a
condition, can you accept it?

\N<Segi>I'll accept... If you say it's okay, then I'll accept. So
please... my request.

\N<Rozaro>Alright... then become my wife. Break off with Yuia and
become my woman.

\N<Rozaro>There's nothing surprising about it, is there? We've already
met in secret many times. It's only natural that we would
get married after such a relationship.
\N<Segi>But... I... have...

\N<Rozaro>Forget about Yuia. That's for the best for both you and
Yuia.

\N<Rozaro>After all, how can you face him now? When everything is
over, can you return to his arms as if nothing happened?

\N<Rozaro>Or do you plan to tell him that you were embraced by another
man to save your husband, defiled... and eventually fell
into despair, becoming a female who can't release her
desires without a male?
\N<Segi>That... is...

\N<Rozaro>Knowing love makes me stronger. You taught me that. If so, I
can become a man strong enough to protect you.
\N<Rozaro>Never again... will I let any scoundrel come near you.
\N<Segi>But... I... am...

\N<Rozaro>Segi-san, your hesitation at this point is because you're
not facing your own heart and are concerned about others and
your surroundings. Try being honest with yourself for once.
\N<Segi>Eh!? What are you...?!

\N<Rozaro>If we do this, you won't even have to look into my eyes.
There won't be any shadows of Yuia flickering in your mind.
And you won't be swayed by those around you.
\N<Segi>Ro, Rozaro-san...

\N<Rozaro>I'll ask one last time. Being embraced by me tonight means
becoming my wife, my woman. Are you prepared for that?
\N<Segi>That... is...
\N<Rozaro>...
\N<Segi>...

\N<Segi>I understand... Tonight, I will be embraced by you under
that promise...

\N<Rozaro>Good, that's settled then. If that's the case, tomorrow I
won't let you fight Zuuteruka.
\N<Segi>Eh...?

\N<Rozaro>It's only natural. No husband would willingly put his wife
in danger. Understand, Segi-san?

\N<Segi>But... if we do that... what about Yuia-sama who is
imprisoned...

\N<Rozaro>Don't worry, I'll take care of it. Now that I've been
recognized as a strong man by them, I should have that
right.
\N<Rozaro>So it's settled then? Have you made up your mind?
\N<Segi>Understood... I'll do as you say...

\N<Rozaro>Hmm, that concludes our discussion then. Before we proceed,
we should talk things over with Riia properly. Wait for me
in the room.

\N<Segi>No way, you're bringing Riia here...? Are we going to talk
here...?

\N<Rozaro>Yes, I'll go pick him up with Rame. Having her with me will
make Riia less wary than if I were alone.

\N<Rozaro>Meanwhile, Segi-san, you wait here as you are. Can you keep
that promise?

\N<Segi>Stay like this...? But that means showing Riia myself in
such a state...

\N<Rozaro>Don't worry. Of course, I won't do something like letting
him into the room suddenly.

\N<Rozaro>After all, if you and I become husband and wife, he will
also be my son. There's no way I would do something like
exposing his mother's lewdness. Is that alright?
\N<Segi>I understand...
\N<Segi>But please come back quickly... otherwise, I...
\N<Segi>It's quiet... Maybe because it's late at night.

\N<Segi>No... that's not it. I think it's exactly as Rozaro-san
said, I've always been too concerned about others and my
surroundings.

\N<Segi>That's why... by doing this, I can see things I couldn't see
before and hear things I couldn't hear.

\N<Segi>And... indeed, being like this makes me feel like I can face
my own heart.

\N<Segi>No... that's probably not right either. To think that doing
this... listening to what he says is facing myself must
surely be sophistry.
\N<Segi>I know that... but there's nothing I can do about it now.

\N<Segi>Even though I know I'm just running away... my legs won't
stop.
